org.epochx.epox.math
Class SquareFunction

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.epox.Node
      org.epochx.epox.math.SquareFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class SquareFunction
extends Node

A function node which performs the arithmetic function of squaring, that is - raising to the second power. It is equivalent to the PowerFunction where the second child is the literal 2.

Constructor Summary
SquareFunction()
          Constructs a SquareFunction with one null child.

          Constructs a SquareFunction with one numerical child node.

Method Detail

evaluate

public java.lang.Object evaluate()
Evaluates this function. The child node is evaluated, the result of which must be a numeric type (one of Double, Float, Long, Integer). The result is raised to the power of 2 and returned as the same type as the input.

Specified by:
evaluate in class Node
Returns:
the result of evaluating the node tree rooted at this node.

getIdentifier

public java.lang.String getIdentifier()
Returns the identifier of this function which is SQUARE.

Specified by:
getIdentifier in class Node
Returns:
a String identifier for this node.

getReturnType

public java.lang.Class<?> getReturnType(java.lang.Class<?>... inputTypes)
Returns this function node's return type for the given child input types. If there is one input type of a numeric type then the return type will be that numeric type. In all other cases this method will return null to indicate that the inputs are invalid.

Overrides:
getReturnType in class Node
Parameters:
inputTypes - the set of input data-types for which to get the return type.
Returns:
a numeric class or null if the input type is invalid.
